original_text: Although he did not remove the high places from Israel, Asa’s heart was fully committed to the Lord all his life.
korean_text: 산당은 이스라엘 중에서 제하지 아니하였으나 아사의 마음이 일평생 온전하였더라

sentences.original_text: Although he did not remove the high places from Israel
Asa's heart was fully committed to the Lord
